about_the_game:
This is the official Fan Pack for Siren’s Call: Escape Velocity! I would strongly advise against looking at it till you beat the game, because there are lots of spoilers. But feel free to do as you like. :)

This pack is a little different from the fan pack tied to the free public beta. It has some extra goodies that we developed over the course of the past year. The headliner is a massive digital art book featuring some developer insights and key pieces of art/concept art from the game. We also included Andi's personal fitness plan and Judith's cookbook so you can live the Siren's Call lifestyle. There's also a very nice live-wallpaper featuring Violet.

In addition to the new stuff, we've also added more wallpapers and music! Along with the 13 HQ wallpapers from the beta, we also have included 7 new HQ wallpapers featuring CGs from the final release. The OST has gone from 31 songs to over 50, and the development booklet and short story written by the game's co-writer, Cory Nungesser, is also included.

So in summation, this pack includes:

*A digital artbook that is over 60 pages long

*Over 50 original tracks from the game (including some unused ones)

*A development booklet offering some insights into the production of Siren's Call: Escape Velocity

*A fun-side story featuring characters from Cory Nungesser's Baker's Paradise novels and the characters of Siren's Call*20 HQ wallpapers for your computer

*Andi's personal fitness plan

*Judith's cookbook

*Violet's live-2D wallpaper
Thank you so much for supporting our small team by purchasing this fanpack. It's been said before, but support like this will help us make more games in the Siren’s Call universe, so it is very, very appreciated.

You can access all of these by going into Siren’s Call’s Properties after downloading and clicking the “Browse Local Files” button. This will take you to the Siren’s Call game directory, where the Fan Pack is included after purchase.

This is the official Fan Pack for Siren’s Call: Escape Velocity! I would strongly advise against looking at it till you beat the game, because there are lots of spoilers. But feel free to do as you like. :)

This pack is a little different from the fan pack tied to the free public beta. It has some extra goodies that we developed over the course of the past year. We also included Andi's personal fitness plan and Judith's cookbook so you can live the Siren's Call lifestyle. There's also a very nice live-wallpaper featuring Violet.

In addition to the new stuff, we've also added more wallpapers and music! Along with the 13 HQ wallpapers from the beta, we also have included 7 new HQ wallpapers featuring CGs from the final release. The OST has gone from 31 songs to over 50, and the development booklet and short story written by the game's co-writer, Cory Nungesser, is also included.

You can access all of these by going into Siren’s Call’s Properties after downloading and clicking the “Browse Local Files” button. This will take you to the Siren’s Call game directory, where the Fan Pack is included after purchase.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A fan pack containing bonus goodies for people who have completed Siren's Call: Escape Velocity. From art books to cook books, and wallpapers and music, there is something here for every fan of the game!
